data.title: OFTC Launches New Web Feature: Maps & Virtual Tours of Campus Facilities
data.meta_description: Maps and Virtual Tours of OFTC campus facilities are now available to students and visitors of the OFTC website.
data.text:
OFTC — A brand new web feature – Maps and Virtual Tours of Oconee Fall Line Technical College’s (OFTC) campus facilities at the Dublin, Sandersville, Instructional Center, Jefferson County Center & Little Ocmulgee Instructional Center locations – is now available to students and visitors of the OFTC website.

Maps & Virtual Tours

Desktop View:

Mobile View:

Visitors can now navigate the OFTC campus from their computer or smart phone to get an up-close look at the College’s state-of-the-art facilities, classrooms, labs, and more. Visitors can use the navigation at the top of the browser to move between campuses and use the legend on the left to move around to various stops around campus.

Ready to embark on a virtual journey? Start planning your path to success with a virtual tour of your nearest OFTC location.

Learn more about OFTC’s 130+ programs at OFTC.edu. Summer classes are starting soon!

###

ABOUT OFTC

The mission of Oconee Fall Line Technical College, a unit of the Technical College System of Georgia, is to contribute to the economic and workforce development of east central Georgia through quality technical and continuing education, adult education, and business and industry services. The College offers associate degrees, diplomas, technical certificates of credit, and non-credit certificates in a student-centered learning environment through traditional and distance education modes of delivery.

ABOUT TCSG
